The five drawbacks of a charnel ground [: It's a gathering place for savage monsters
It's a weeping place for many people
The five drawbacks of a person like a ch: Filthy conduct by way of body
Filthy conduct by way of speech
Filthy conduct by way of mind
Good-hearted spiritual companions avoid them from afar
They live together with people of a similar character
When good-hearted spiritual companions see them they complain
They're just as much a weeping place for many people as a charnel ground.
